Package com.spire.pdf.grid

Class Summary
PdfGrid Represents the pdf grid class for all elements that can be layout on the pages.
PdfGridCell Represents pdf grid-cell property.
PdfGridCellCollection set and add for the Pdf Grid Cell Collection
PdfGridCellContent definition Grid Cell Content
PdfGridCellContentList definition PdfGridCellTextAndStyle Collections
PdfGridCellStyle Represents pdf grid-cell style.
PdfGridColumn Represents pdf grid cell style.
PdfGridColumnCollection The class pdf grid column collection.
PdfGridHeaderCollection The class pdf grid header collection.
PdfGridLayoutFormat Defines parameters for PdfGrid layout.
PdfGridRow The class for pdf grid row operations
PdfGridRowCollection The class user to pdf grid row collection operation
PdfGridRowStyle  
PdfGridStyle The class user for pdf grid style type operations
PdfGridStyleBase The class defines pdf grid style the common methods and fields
